Text:
Note: These apps are for Windows XP.
-Working on a Vista version.
Thanks a million. This should be useful for translators who want to start using CAT tools.

This torrent contains a backdoor... Download at your own risk...

It had several errors in the attempt to install and use it, and crashed over and over.

It appeared that after that an activation of the SVChost.exe in the windows system was happening all the time, using my bandwidth opening several inbound and outbound connections where I could monitor a whole lot of bytes being send and received from IP addresses I wont mention here.

Do not install these tools
